cast.name: 伊索尔德·巴尔特 Isolde Barth
维蒂姆·格洛纳 Vadim Glowna

this_title: Herlemanns Traum oder Das andere Leben
trans_title: 赫尔曼的梦想或是另一种生活
introduction: Herbert Benner becomes the sporting director of the Chaussee-Bahn, a cycle track where there is no longer much going on. No money, no attractive races, no spectators, that's the situation Benner is faced with, but he pulls his people along and gets the track up and running again. Only - Benner doesn't exist and neither does the Chaussee-Bahn. All of this is just Herlemann's dream, a dream that is so strong and intense for him that he lives more as Benner than as Herlemann.
chinese_title: 赫尔曼的梦想或是另一种生活
foreign_title: Herlemanns Traum oder Das andere Leben
